full_summary:
================

Laboratory Services
-----------------

**Official Tender Reference Number:** cb-452-55667202

**Bid Opportunity:** The Correctional Service Canada is seeking bids for laboratory services to support the Stony Mountain Institution.

**Background:**
The tender notice announces an Advance Contract Award Notice, which indicates that a contract has already been awarded to a supplier. The selected supplier has been tasked with testing laboratory specimens received from Correctional Service Canada and reporting results to the Stony Mountain Institution according to professionally accepted standards.

**Tender Details:**

*   **Tender Type:** Open to all interested bidders
*   **Procurement Category:** Services - SRV
*   **Scope of Work:** Testing of laboratory specimens and reporting results to the Stony Mountain Institution
*   **Estimated Contract Value:**
    *   *Maximum Value: $10,000,000*
    *   *Expected Contract Start Date: March 1, 2024*
    *   *Expected Contract End Date: July 31, 2028*
*   **Geographic Scope:** Manitoba, Canada

**Contracting Entity:**

*   **Name:** Correctional Service Canada
*   **Address:** 3427 Faithfull Avenue, Saskatoon, Saskatchewan S7K 3X5

**Points of Contact:**

*   **Name:** Teri Fraser
*   **Email:** [501Contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:501Contracts@csc-scc.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** (306) 659-9300

**Tender Notice:**

The complete tender notice, including the bidding process, evaluation criteria, and bid submission instructions, can be found in the attachment section.

**Attachments:**

Please refer to the following links to access the tender notice and the attached documents:

*   [English Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30512/51000-23-4330916-acan-en.pdf)
*   [French Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30512/51000-23-4330916-acan-fr.pdf)

To submit a bid or for more information, please contact Teri Fraser at the provided email address or phone number. The tender closing date is February 12, 2024, at 3:00 PM CST.
